title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 4.6 - Postponements and adjournments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 4.6 - Postponements and adjournments

State Regulations

All parties should be prepared to proceed at the first
hearing called in any proceeding. Any motion to postpone the first hearing
shall set forth the reasons why the postponement is needed and be filed in time
to permit other parties to be notified. Any hearing may be adjourned from time
to time by the presiding officer, and the first hearing may be postponed by the
presiding officer even if its date was set by order of the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
4.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
